document.full_text: the japanese nuclear crisis has created a public-relations headache for general electric co , but the company so far has escaped any legal fallout, and many experts expect it will continue to do so.
document.title: ge unlikely to face liability in japanese nuclear crisis
lines_and_colors: the japanese nuclear crisis has created a public-relations headache for general electric co , but the company so far has escaped any legal fallout, and many experts expect it will continue to do so.
